questions.question: I am facing East. I turn 180 degreesin the clockwise direction and then 90 degreesin the anti – clockwise direction. Which direction am I facing now?

arshini and Sowmya are standing 10 m apart and Harshini is towards Sowmya’s left. Both start travelling towards North, walk for about 30 m and then turn right to travel 40 m further. Harshini then takes a left turn, travels 20 m and stops but Sowmya takes a right turn to travel 10 m. Sowmya again turns right, travels 10 m and stops. How far are they from each other?
